transcription_link: Estia Developments-Remote Helpers - 2025/08/06 11:51 EEST - Notes by Gemini
email_content:
Hi Georges,

I wanted to stay in touch and reconnect after our last conversation about potential collaboration between Estia Developments and Remote Helpers. It was great learning more about your team's operations in Greece and your interest in exploring remote developers and sales support for future projects.

From our side, Remote Helpers can assist you with:
üíª Developers and IT specialists ‚Äî for web and in-house application development, system integrations, and automation.
üí° Sales and customer relations assistants ‚Äî supporting your international outreach and client communication.
‚öôÔ∏è Flexible collaboration models ‚Äî part-time, full-time, or project-based, with an easy onboarding process and a 3-day trial to ensure the right fit.

As discussed, you can hire for a defined period, scale the team as needed, and manage performance through our CRM system and time tracker, which provides full visibility into daily activities.

Would Monday or Tuesday at 3:00 or 4:00 PM your time work for a short follow-up call to review updated pricing and candidate options?
You can also learn more about our services and available specialists here: https://rh-s.com/app
